item.title: interests
item.author: me@daniel-salmon.com (daniel salmon)
item.description: someday i’ll fill this out more thoroughly, but shooting from the hip some of the topics i’m most interested in / working on these days: distributed systems cryptography the relation of the above two with game theory databases side interests: quantum mechanics / quantum field theory transcendental numbers hacking on whatever is holding my attention that day brazilian jiu-jitsu although with the pandemic i’ve just been riding my bike things i’m pretty sure i’m not interested in:
